verbose_text: In a recently published study, a fALS patient bearing an optineurin mutation (E478G) displayed features of several proteinopathies, including phosphorylated TDP-43, phosphorylated tau, and alpha-synuclein, although it was not examined whether optineurin is present in these inclusions.
evidence: phosphorylated TDP-43, phosphorylated tau, and alpha-synuclein
